The Algonquin Round Table was a celebrated group of New York City writers, 
critics, actors, and wits. Gathering initially as part of a practical joke, members of "
The Vicious Circle", as they dubbed themselves, met for lunch each day at the 
Algonquin Hotel from 1919 until roughly 1929. ... The group that would become 
the Round Table began meeting in June 1919...
